scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test
scripts.deploy: cf target -o defra-next-warning-system -s sandbox && cf push xws-area-api-sandbox
scripts.deploy:sandbox: cf login -a api.london.cloud.service.gov.uk -o defra-next-warning-system -s sandbox && cf push xws-area-api-sandbox
scripts.deploy:test: cf login -a api.london.cloud.service.gov.uk -o defra-next-warning-system -s test && cf push xws-area-api-test
